thread.title: Ground News - 1-year-old child found safe in Texas Amber Alert case, suspect in custody
thread.title_full: Ground News - 1-year-old child found safe in Texas Amber Alert case, suspect in custody

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - 1-year-old child found safe in Texas Amber Alert case, suspect in custody
text: KANSAS CITY, Mo. -- An Amber Alert case in Texas that reached the Kansas City metro this week has been canceled after a one-year-old child was located safe in Minnesota. A suspect is in custody, according to the Missouri State Highway Patrol. The child was first reported missing in Texas on Feb. 8. The child and the suspect in the case were spotted this week in the Kansas City metro.
